title: A surface-to-bulk tuning deep delithiation strategy for 5C fast-charging 4.6 V LiCoO2
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01674B, Paper
Zhihong Bi, Zonglin Yi, Anping Zhang, Cong Dong, Gongrui Wang, Lijing Xie, Shihao Liao, Hanqing Liu, Chengmeng Chen, Zhong-Shuai Wu
Integrated structural regulation from the bulk to the surface enables deep delithiation and stable 5C long cycling of 4.6 V LiCoO2 for extremely fast charging.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
